posts.title: 安装ArchLinux的简单记录
posts.text: Pre-Installion Installion将准备安装ArchLinux的分区挂载到/mnt。-# mount /dev/sda1 /mnt 安装base base-devel软件包组。-#pacstrap /mnt base base-devel Configure将FSTAB文件注入/etc。-# genfstab - U /mnt >> /mnt/etc/fstab CHROOT进入已安装的ArchLinux。-arch-chroot /mnt 设置时区-ln -sf /usr/share/zoneinfo/Asia/Shanghai /etc/localtime After Installion

posts.title: DaiBoYu?
posts.text: Q:About DaiBoYuA:Infinite DaiBoYu, a SB. Q:Why DaiBoYu is a SB?A:Cause he didn’t message me and almost forget me. Q:Say something to DaiA:Hope we get to the same classroom

posts.title: Test
posts.text: Welcome to Here! This is a test post. My name is Cnachen, and I was hired by people to play with ArchLinux. This Blog is made using Hexo, Node.js and git. GitHub
